infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RiderApp needs location access to track your motorcycle rides and provide accurate GPS data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RiderApp needs location access to track your motorcycle rides even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: RiderApp needs access to your music library to play songs during your rides.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: RiderApp needs microphone access for voice commands during rides.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RiderApp to use your location to track your motorcycle rides.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow RiderApp to use your location in the background to continue tracking your rides.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow RiderApp to use your location to track your motorcycle rides.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow RiderApp to access your media library to play music during rides.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow RiderApp to save photos to your media library.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow RiderApp to access your microphone for voice commands during rides.
